Грамота: On March 27, 2025, the General Director of IPP New Technologies LLC, Safarov Yan Raufovich, was awarded the Certificate of Honor for his services in the development of international, foreign economic and interregional relations of the Republic of Bashkortostan with the constituent entities of the Russian Federation.
Выставка: From September 25 to 27, 2024, IPP New Technologies LLC successfully took part in the 29th Kazakhstan International KIOGE Oil and Gas Exhibition, where innovative technologies and the main trends in the development of the global oil and gas industry were presented.
Конкурс: LLC IPP «New Technologies» took 2nd place in the competition «Exporter of the Year 2022» in the category «Breakthrough of the Year among Subjects, Small and Medium Enterprises» in the Republic of Bashkortostan as part of the International Business Week.
